name: Daimio Arena
description:
Daimio
This is the last project we are working on. Still in a very early stage of development. At the end of next month we will bring you a playable demo. At the moment only some pre-production and development images.
Video game battle arena multiplayer online, moba game. Based on feudal japan.
Fight with your daimio in exciting epic battles to victory.

train your troops, make new conquests and get new units. Lead your army and lead it to victory.

Game produced by No Glow Studio. 
Game Design, props design, level design, 3d and programming: Jaime Rico Amador
